skills.name: React
skills.description: A JavaScript library for building dynamic user interfaces, primarily used for single-page applications.

skills.name: Redux & RTK Query
skills.description: A state management tool with a powerful API data-fetching library that provides an efficient way to manage application state and interact with external data sources.

skills.name: Next.js
skills.description: A React framework for server-side rendering, static site generation, and building full-stack applications.

skills.name: HTML & CSS
skills.description: The fundamental building blocks of the web, used for structuring and styling content on websites.

skills.name: MongoDB & Mongoose
skills.description: MongoDB is a NoSQL database, and Mongoose is an ODM library that provides a schema-based solution for modeling MongoDB data.

skills.name: Tailwind CSS & Bootstrap
skills.description: Tailwind is a utility-first CSS framework, while Bootstrap is a popular CSS framework for responsive design, both helping to style websites quickly.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: A versatile programming language used to add interactive functionality to websites and applications.

skills.name: TanStack Query & Axios
skills.description: TanStack Query is a data-fetching library for managing server-side state, while Axios is a promise-based HTTP client for making requests to APIs.

skills.name: Node.js & Express.js
skills.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment, and Express.js is a minimal Node.js framework for building web servers and APIs.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static types, improving the development process by catching errors early.

skills.name: Git & NPM
skills.description: Git is a version control system, and NPM is the default package manager for Node.js, both essential for modern web development.

skills.name: Ant Design & NextUI
skills.description: Ant Design is a React UI framework for building enterprise-level applications, while NextUI is a modern React UI library for fast web development.

skills.name: JWT Authentication
skills.description: A token-based authentication method used to securely transmit information between parties in a compact, URL-safe format.

skills.name: Firebase & NextAuth
skills.description: Firebase Authentication provides easy authentication via multiple methods, while NextAuth is an open-source authentication solution for Next.js applications.
